item.title: Berkshire shares dip after earnings decline, lack of buybacks disappoint investors
item.description: A move that caught many by surprise was a big write-down for Berkshire's underperforming Kraft Heinz stake.

item.title: Housing to remain weakest part of economy, falling 8% in the second half, Goldman says
item.description: The Wall Street investment bank named immigration and affordability challenges as two obstacles standing in the way a housing boost.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: On Semiconductor, Wayfair, Spotify, Tesla and more
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading Monday.

item.title: Berkshire Hathaway operating earnings dip 4% as conglomerate braces for tariff impact
item.description: Berkshire's operating profit dipped 4% year over year to $11.16 billion in the second quarter.

item.title: Robotaxis are becoming a reality. Whoâ€™s poised to win in China and beyond
item.description: Shanghai in late July became the latest region in China to allow fully autonomous taxis to charge fares in parts of the city.
